prod_desc: Watch your step while you explore new things in the jungle!
prod_long_desc:
Discover exciting things in the depths of the LEGO® City jungle with the Jungle Mobile Lab, featuring a truck with opening sides and roof, a waterfall build with a crocodile and temple with a moving leaf that hides a treasure, plus a buildable Venus flytrap plant with closing ‘mouth’ and a kayak. Includes 4 minifigures plus crocodile and spider figures.
Build a Mobile Lab for the Jungle Explorers as they continue their adventure longer into the jungle and discover a waterfall mini-build with hidden treasure!
Includes 4 Jungle Explorer minifigures, crocodile and spider figures, plus special hidden treasure element
LEGO City building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Jungle Mobile Lab measures over 4” high, 7” long, and 2” wide. Waterfall build measures over 3” high, 7” wide, and 6” long
426 pieces – For boy and girls between the ages of 7 and 12 years old
